page.title: 15Saturday for a Teenager
page.content: It was Saturday and I was going to meet my friends in town.We met by the CO-OP in Countess Wear and caught the bus into town. We got off the bus at the bus station, walked out through the alley way into Boots. By the time we had finished looking around we were getting a bit hungry so we thought we would go to get something to eat. We thought about where to go and decided on the new pizza place which has just opened in the high street. After that we went down to the Guild Hall to see if they had anything going on _ they usally do. In the evening we all met up together and went to the Riverside club.
